greeting.title: Hello everyone, I'm Samir
greeting.subTitle: I am a dedicated junior developer with a robust foundation in software engineering and practical experience in full-stack development. I am actively seeking an opportunity to apply my skills and expand my knowledge in a dynamic and innovative environment. My innate curiosity and adaptability equip me to address a wide range of technical challenges, whether in front-end or back-end development. I am particularly drawn to projects that encourage continuous learning and foster a collaborative work culture. I am eager to contribute meaningfully to a forward-thinking and dedicated team. If you're looking for a passionate developer committed to making a positive impact, I would love to connect :)

skillsSection.title: My Expertise
skillsSection.subTitle: Passionate Full Stack Developer eager to explore and master diverse technology stacks to create innovative solutions.
skills: ✨ Develop highly interactive front-end/user interfaces for web and mobile applications using Angular, React, and Flutter
✨ Create robust application backends with Node.js, Express, and Spring Boot
✨ Design and implement Progressive Web Applications (PWA) in both standard and single-page application (SPA) stacks
✨ Integrate third-party services such as Firebase and AWS for enhanced application functionality
✨ Optimize application performance and ensure smooth deployment to production environments
✨ Collaborate with design teams to integrate new designs and enhance user experience
✨ Perform unit and server testing to ensure application reliability
✨ Develop secure authentication and authorization systems
✨ Write and execute complex SQL queries for data management and retrieval
✨ Participate in code reviews and brainstorming sessions to foster continuous improvement and innovation
✨ Manage real-time communication using WebSocket protocols for interactive applications
✨ Utilize DevOps practices for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD)

fullStackDeveloper.desc1: ✨ Collaborated with the team to understand the specific requirements of version 2.0 of the Comparastore dashboard.
fullStackDeveloper.desc2: ✨ Evaluated existing features and identified necessary improvements.
fullStackDeveloper.desc3: ✨ Set up the backend of the dashboard using Next.js.
fullStackDeveloper.desc4: ✨ Created robust APIs to support the application's features and ensure optimal performance.
fullStackDeveloper.desc5: ✨ Integrated features and user interfaces into the dashboard using Next.js.
fullStackDeveloper.desc6: ✨ Participated in the deployment process of the application to production.

bullet1.title: Filter, Booking, and Chat
bullet1.description: A warehouse admin can view all bookings and filter them based on various criteria, such as customer name, booking number, and other relevant details. Additionally, the admin can update or add comprehensive information to each booking and access the full history of interactions between the client and the warehouse.

bullet2.title: Analytics
bullet2.description: An admin can view all detailed analytics for each warehouse and compare them by selecting from a list. This information is available across four different pages: Summary, Acquisition, Conversion, and Satisfaction.

programmerAnalyst.desc1: ✨ Created the user interface using Angular, ensuring responsiveness and user-friendliness.
programmerAnalyst.desc2: ✨ Designed the Firebase database structure according to the application's requirements.
programmerAnalyst.desc3: ✨ Configured and developed the backend server with Node.js.
programmerAnalyst.desc4: ✨ Implemented features allowing users to post ads with details, images, and availability.
programmerAnalyst.desc5: ✨ Set up a secure authentication and authorization system using Firebase.

softwareEngineer.desc1: ✨ Implemented server-side functionalities in C to respond to requests from the Android application (Kotlin).
softwareEngineer.desc2: ✨ Developed Kotlin application-side functionalities to interact with the server.
softwareEngineer.desc3: ✨ Sent requests via Socket from the Kotlin application.
softwareEngineer.desc4: ✨ Appropriately processed responses on the application side.

bullet1.title: SMOL: The Autonomous Vehicle Powered by Android
bullet1.description: SMOL is our custom-built autonomous vehicle, seamlessly controlled via our Android application. Designed for efficiency and precision, SMOL is a cutting-edge example of smart mobility in action.

scrabbleDeveloper.desc1: ✨ Designed and developed a multiplayer game application with real-time chat features.
scrabbleDeveloper.desc2: ✨ Developed the mobile version using Flutter (Dart).
scrabbleDeveloper.desc3: ✨ Developed the web version using Angular.
scrabbleDeveloper.desc4: ✨ Used MongoDB for data storage and management.
scrabbleDeveloper.desc5: ✨ Set up a server with Node.js.
scrabbleDeveloper.desc7: ✨ Saved chat data and maintained chat history.

secondYearProject.desc1: ✨ Developed the first version of a two-player Scrabble game.
secondYearProject.desc2: ✨ Used Angular with TypeScript for frontend development.
secondYearProject.desc3: ✨ Set up a server using Node.js.
secondYearProject.desc4: ✨ No database integration, so no history or authentication features.
secondYearProject.desc5: ✨ Focused on real-time gameplay between two players.

firstYearProject.desc1: ✨ Programmed an autonomous robot using C.
firstYearProject.desc2: ✨ Enabled the robot to avoid obstacles.
